articles.description: Darwin Núñez's impact against Fulham could have big repercussions for one Liverpool legend, and signify the end of his time in Jürgen Klopp's starting XI.
articles.content:
Most people believed that Roberto Firmino would start the first game of the Premier League season against Fulham before a ball had been kicked.
 Starting Firmino made sense in a lot of ways. Diogo J… [+2727 chars]

articles.author: Eleanor Barlow, PA
articles.title: Five footballers' names read to potential jurors in Benjamin Mendy trial - The Mirror
articles.description: Manchester City defender Benjamin Mendy's sexual offences trial started at Chester Crown Court on Wednesday, with a jury set to be sworn in during the coming days
articles.content:
Potential jurors in the sexual offences trial of Manchester City footballer Benjamin Mendy have been asked if they have connections to five Premier League players.
